topics.body:
FUCKING HELL!

You know how it hurts when you hit your toe?  Well cause my toenail is fucked up currently cause I'm trying to stop it from becoming ingrown when I hit the toenail it literally stabbed my toe.  On the scale of 1 - 10 I'd rate on my scale of pain about a 2, but on a normal person's scale of pain about a 7.

You know what; I'm going to do something stupid and metaphorically fuck with my toe to see if I had get the fucked up part removed.  Not a lot of my toenail is fucked up; I can do it, I just need to be slightly drunk so that it doesn't hurt as much.

Forceps, tweasers, disinfectant, cutting tools all check.  I'm heating up the stuff beforehand with alcohol to disinfect them, then cool them in strong alcohol and then take care of this.

Is this advisable?  No.
Do I have the money to get a ingrown toenail removed?  No.
Can I do this?  Yes, it's just going to hurt.

Tl:dr; hitting a ingrown toenail hurts.  I'm going to remove the ingrown part since it's only a chip on the side; be back in twenty.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
